shef.mt.features.util

Class FeatureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.features.util.FeatureManager

  • public class FeatureManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The FeatureManager controls the loading, instantiation and running of the features.
    It parses the user-supplied list of feature indeces and uses a FeatureLoader to instantiate the selected features
    It also provides a method for running the features over a given pair of source-target Sentences
